languages.text: Allies, including the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Grand Strategist{/g}, in the same Combat Tactics area with the Grand Strategist gain +{uip|StatBonus|0baaa1db7cf44a52ac7cf9beee62f230} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}.
languages.original_text: Союзники, находящиеся в одной зоне {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Стратегического{/g} плана с великим стратегом, и сам великий стратег получают +{uip|StatBonus|0baaa1db7cf44a52ac7cf9beee62f230} к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Восприятию{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Allies, including the Strategist, in the same Combat Tactics area with the Strategist gain +3+(INT bonus) to perception and agility.
Allies, including the Strategist, in the same Combat Tactics area with the Strategist gain +(3 + INT bonus) to Perception and Agility.

traits.locale_text: Союзники, находящиеся в одной зоне Стратегического плана со стратегом, и сам стратег получают +(3 + {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} ИНТ) к Восприятию и Ловкости.
Союзники, находящиеся в одной зоне Стратегического плана со стратегом, и сам стратег получают +(3 + {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} ИНТ) к Восприятию и Ловкости.
Союзники, находящиеся в одной зоне Стратегического плана со стратегом, и сам стратег получают +{uip|StatBonus|0baaa1db7cf44a52ac7cf9beee62f230} к Восприятию и Ловкости.

languages.text: 所有与{g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}战略大师{/g}处于同一战斗策略区域的盟友（包括战略大师本人），{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}提高{uip|StatBonus|0baaa1db7cf44a52ac7cf9beee62f230}点。

traits.locale_text: 所有与{g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}战略大师{/g}处于同一战斗策略区域的盟友（包括战略大师本人），{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}提高{uip|StatBonus|0baaa1db7cf44a52ac7cf9beee62f230}点。
所有与战略大师处于同一战斗策略区域的盟友（包括战略大师本人），{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}提高{uip|StatBonus|0baaa1db7cf44a52ac7cf9beee62f230}。

languages.text: Todos los aliados presentes en la misma zona de Tácticas de combate que el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}gran estratega{/g} ganan +{uip|StatBonus|0baaa1db7cf44a52ac7cf9beee62f230} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Percepción{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Todos los aliados presentes en la misma zona de Tácticas de combate que el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}gran estratega{/g} (incluido este) ganan +{uip|StatBonus|0baaa1db7cf44a52ac7cf9beee62f230} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Percepción{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g}.

Todos los aliados presentes en la misma zona de Tácticas de combate que el estratega (incluido este) ganan +{uip|StatBonus|0baaa1db7cf44a52ac7cf9beee62f230} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Percepción{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g}.

languages.text: Verbündete (einschließlich des {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Großstrategen{/g} selbst), die sich im selben Gefechtstaktiken-Gebiet wie der Großstratege befinden, erhalten +{uip|StatBonus|0baaa1db7cf44a52ac7cf9beee62f230} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmung{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g}.
languages.original_text: Allies, including the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Grand Strategist{/g}, in the same Combat Tactics area with the Grand Strategist gain +{uip|StatBonus|0baaa1db7cf44a52ac7cf9beee62f230} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Verbündete (einschließlich des {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Großstrategen{/g} selbst), die sich im selben Gefechtstaktiken-Gebiet wie der Großstratege befinden, erlangen +{uip|StatBonus|0baaa1db7cf44a52ac7cf9beee62f230} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmung{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g}.

Verbündete (einschließlich des Strategen selbst), die sich im selben Gefechtstaktiken-Gebiet wie der Stratege befinden, erlangen +{uip|StatBonus|0baaa1db7cf44a52ac7cf9beee62f230} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmung{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g}.

languages.text: Les alliés ({g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}grand stratège{/g} compris) présents dans la même zone de Tactiques de combat que le grand stratège bénéficient de +{uip|StatBonus|0baaa1db7cf44a52ac7cf9beee62f230} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} et d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g}.
languages.original_text: Allies, including the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Grand Strategist{/g}, in the same Combat Tactics area with the Grand Strategist gain +{uip|StatBonus|0baaa1db7cf44a52ac7cf9beee62f230} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Les alliés (Stratège compris) présents dans la même zone de Tactiques de Combat que le Stratège bénéficient de +(3 + {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}INT{/g}) de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} et d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g}.

Les alliés (Stratège compris) présents dans la même zone de Tactiques de Combat que le Stratège bénéficient de +{uip|StatBonus|0baaa1db7cf44a52ac7cf9beee62f230} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} et d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g}.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}大戦略家{/g}と同じ軍略エリア内にいる味方（戦略家自身を含む）は、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}知覚{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}が+{uip|StatBonus|0baaa1db7cf44a52ac7cf9beee62f230}増加する。
languages.original_text: Allies, including the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Grand Strategist{/g}, in the same Combat Tactics area with the Grand Strategist gain +{uip|StatBonus|0baaa1db7cf44a52ac7cf9beee62f230} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 戦略家と同じ軍略エリア内にいる味方（戦略家自身を含む）は、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}知覚{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}が+(3 + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}INT{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g})増加する。
戦略家と同じ軍略エリア内にいる味方（戦略家自身を含む）は、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}知覚{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}が+{uip|StatBonus|0baaa1db7cf44a52ac7cf9beee62f230}増加する。

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Büyük Stratejist{/g} ile aynı Çatışma Taktikleri alanında bulunan dost birimler (Büyük Stratejist de dâhil), +{uip|StatBonus|0baaa1db7cf44a52ac7cf9beee62f230} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Algı{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Çeviklik{/g} kazanırlar.
languages.original_text: Allies, including the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Grand Strategist{/g}, in the same Combat Tactics area with the Grand Strategist gain +{uip|StatBonus|0baaa1db7cf44a52ac7cf9beee62f230} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}.
